name: Wanted Driver
description:
Drive car and escape cops! Drive fast as you can to evade the cops. Buy faster cars and become the fastest driver.

You are the most wanted driver in the city. Drive car all around the city, crush people and cars. Cops are really aggressive to arrest you but you can make them crash each other by drifting.

There are many different cars in this game. You can buy better cars by collecting money from missions or crush humans and take their money. Buy these cars and drive them. Some of these cars are fast cars some of them are tough and hard to crash.

Your goal is to evade cops and survive as long as you can to score more. Crush police cars and humans is also a good way to score more points.
